channel.title: Yahoo! News Search Results for Global Warming
channel.description: Yahoo! News Search Results for Global Warming

item.title: Fight against global warming need not dent growth: IMF (AFP via Yahoo! News)
item.description: The International Monetary Fund on Thursday said it was possible to fight global warming without negatively impacting economic growth.

item.title: UN climate talks agree on agenda for 2009 global warming pact (Minneapolis-St. Paul Star Tribune)
item.description: BANGKOK, Thailand - Climate negotiators agreed Saturday on an ambitious agenda for talks they hope will lead to a historic global warming pact, overcoming a heated dispute between Japan and developing countries on how to cut greenhouse gas emissions.

item.title: UN climate talks focus on compromise for 2009 global warming pact (AP via Yahoo! Malaysia News)
item.description: Climate negotiators considered a compromise work schedule Friday for talks leading to a sweeping global warming pact, apparently overcoming a heated dispute over a Japanese proposal on how to cut emissions of greenhouse gases.

item.title: NY goes after EPA in global warming suit (Legislative Gazette)
item.description: New York is becoming one of 17 states demanding the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency regulate pollution believed to cause global warming.

item.title: Swedish students ride bullock carts in global warming drive (New Kerala)
item.description: Chennai, Apr 4 : Swedish students rode bullock carts here on Thursday as part of their nationwide campaign to spread awareness about global warming.

item.title: Historian to speak on global warming (Salina Journal)
item.description: A leading historian of the American West will talk about the possible effects of global warming on the Great Plains in Salina on May 6.

item.title: Seals on NJ Beaches May Be Result of Global Warming (KYW News Radio 1060)
item.description: The president of a South Jersey marine life rescue facility says an increase in the number of arctic seals showing up on garden state beaches may be a direct result of the effects of global warming.

item.title: Global warming, slither, slither (The News & Observer)
item.description: The liberal media is often accused of exaggerating the effects of global warming in order to advance our own selfish, narrow-minded agenda of limiting the growth of big business, restricting free enterprise, saving the planet, etc.

item.title: African activists urge 1 pct GDP to fight global warming (AFP via Yahoo! News)
item.description: African activists, saying the continent is getting a "raw deal" in climate talks, called Thursday for major polluters to commit one percent of GDP to fight the ravages of global warming.

item.title: Reduce Global Warming With Your Cell Phone (PollutionOnline)
item.description: The Wireless Source issued a challenge recently for individuals and organizations to attain a "carbon neutral" status by the end of 2008. Simultaneously they introduced a program supported by Carbonfund.org to lead the fight against global warming climate change, making it easy and affordable for any individual, business or organization to eliminate their climate impact by recycling used mobile ...
